name: Tales of Welind: The First King
name_original: Tales of Welind: The First King
description:
The world of Welind has been invaded by Monsters, called "Daedra". Humans and Elves live in harmony, while two factions of Dwarves been fighting each other for hundreds of years. Is in this world that you grow up, in the town of Tobery, where the village has managed to defend itself and live in peace under the care of the Southern King. That is until the Daedra attacked Tobery, changing your life forever.

Follow  your character and his party on their quest to discover the origin of the Daedra, unleashing events that will change the world of Welind forever.

Controls: Arrows to move, Return or Space to select action.

This work is on active development, covering the first few scenes on the character's life. Note that since it is a few scenes the Save/Load functionality is still under development so be careful as you fight the monsters!
